General.Name: Berkem Group SA
General.Description: Groupe Berkem Société anonyme operates in the chemical industry. The company engages in the extraction and supply of natural active ingredients and plant extracts for the cosmetics and food industries. It is also involved in the freeze-drying of raw materials and finished products; production, supply, and distribution of solutions for wood processing markets and the building industry; and manufacture of industrial resins for the paint, construction, timber treatment, and ink industries. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Blanquefort, France.
